pkgmetadata.longdescription: One Time Password Generation and Verification // Generating and validating One-time Password based on Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HOTP) and Time Based One-time Password (TOTP) according to RFC 4226 https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4226 and RFC 6238 https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6238.
